original_text: When Esau was forty years old, he married Judith daughter of Beeri the Hittite, and also Basemath daughter of Elon the Hittite.
korean_text: 에서가 사십 세에 헷 족속 브에리의 딸 유딧과 헷 족속 엘론의 딸 바스맛을 아내로 맞이하였더니

sentences.original_text: When Esau was forty years old
he married Judith daughter of Beeri
and also Basemath daughter of Elon
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 엘론의 딸 바세맛도 아내로 맞았으니
